title: Why Khamenei Is Preparing Iran for War With the US to Protect Regime Survival
desc: Middle East News: Ayatollah Ali Khamenei is restructuring Iran’s leadership, military strategy and internal security as US forces mass in the Middle East. This in‑depth analysis explains why Tehran is simultaneously negotiating in Geneva while preparing for a potential war with the United States, dispersing command, hardening nuclear sites, boosting missile deterrence and cracking down on domestic dissent to ensure regime survival.
